properties.author: Sualeh Fatehi

section.name: SchemaCrawler Site Report - Maven Plug-in Example

subsection.name: Description
subsection.p: The SchemaCrawler Maven plug-in example demonstrates the use of SchemaCrawler to generate a Maven site report.

ol.li:
Install
Maven,
and make sure that Maven is on your path.
Copy the hsqldb jar file from distribution directory into the maven-site-report example directory.
Start the database server by running StartDatabaseServer script from the distribution directory.
Run mvn -Dpassword= site . (The password for the example database isan empty string.)
See the output produced in the target/site directory.
Try using different SchemaCrawler commands in the Maven test project's pom.xml file. (For a complete list of SchemaCrawler commands, run java -jar <schemacrawler-jar> .)
Try defining a new database connection, using your favorite database and driver.
